description.value:
As a minotaur, you have the following ancestral traits.

Size. You are Medium.

Speed. Your walking speed is 30 feet.

Creature Type. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.IVGkmucp6MGFOhBF]{Creature Type} You are a Humanoid.

Horns. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.gW9Rr7HefbsIT2io]{Horns} You have horns that you can use to make unarmed strikes. When you hit with them, the strike deals 1d6 piercing damage, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

Goring Rush. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.ShXqhsB9Ifnopf6Q]{Goring Rush} Immediately after you take the Dash action on your turn and move at least 20 feet, you can make one melee attack with your horns as a bonus action.

Hammering Horns. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.O6MDkno50clOgchN]{Hammering Horns} Immediately after you hit a creature with a melee attack on your turn, you can use a bonus action to attempt to push that target with your horns. The target must be within 5 feet of you and no more than one size larger than you. Unless it succeeds on a Strength saving throw against a DC equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus+ your Strength modifier, you push it up to 10 feet away from you.

Powerful Build. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.dFd9BFCoJFE7TWkc]{Powerful Build} You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

Foundry Note

You can drag your choices from the above onto your character sheet and it will automatically update.
